alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Las Vegas Valley; Southern Clark County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 12:41AM PST until January 11 at 10:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST /11 AM MST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Lake Mead National Recreation Area, the Las Vegas Valley, and Southern Clark County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST /11 AM MST/ this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty northerly winds will blow around unsecured objects and could result in tree limb damage, minor structural damage and a few brief power outages. Periods of blowing dust could also reduce visibility to below 5 miles.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Las Vegas Valley; Southern Clark County
